thread.title: Manchester United star Jesse Lingard picks his dream 5-a-side team that includes Paul Pogba… but not Zlatan Ibrahimovic
thread.title_full: Manchester United star Jesse Lingard picks his dream 5-a-side team that includes Paul Pogba… but not Zlatan Ibrahimovic

author: fnathan
title: Manchester United star Jesse Lingard picks his dream 5-a-side team that includes Paul Pogba… but not Zlatan Ibrahimovic
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments WHEN Jesse Lingard was asked to choose his fantasy 5-a-side team out of his current Manchester United teammates, he had a plenty of decisions to make. 
But oddly, the Red Devils’ youngster opted to leave out esteemed duo Zlatan Ibrahimovic and Marcus Rashford – and not even include himself. News Group Newspapers Ltd 4 Jesse Lingard has missed out a fair few names in his dream five-a-side team 
Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester United news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
His dabbing partner Paul Pogba unsurprisingly does make it in – but the 24-year-old opted for Marcus Rashford to lead the line rather than the more experienced heads. 
FourFourTwo asked Lingard to choose just five out of the world class talent at boss Jose Mourinho’s disposal. Getty Images 4 It is no surprise that Lingard’s pal Paul Pogba anchors the midfield 
And he has seemed to go for a youthful look up to and a more workhorse side, containing the likes of Daley Blind and Ander Herrera. related stories Mid-week retreat Aitor Karanka is taking his struggling Boro side to Spain for some warm weather training this week Ed likes rough 'n' tumble Most fouled Eden Hazard admits to getting motivated when Premier League rivals kick him around the pitch I WANT 100 MAUR Mauricio Pochettino completes 100 Prem games as Spurs boss - and says he wants another century Dont blow it!
